term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - Gaussian band shape
term.title: Gaussian band shape

item.text: A band shape described by the Gaussian function: F(ν - ν0) = (a/sqrt(π)).e^(-a^2)(ν - ν0)^2) is proportional to the width of the band, and ν 0 is the frequency of the band maximum.
